channel.title: Resources on Andrew Fowlie

item.title: Dark matter

item.title: Jaynes
item.description: You can read about Jaynes at Larry Bretthorst’s webpage or Wikipedia. Typeset I am using OCR software to typeset Jaynes’ typewritten works. Bayes again! (1963) [pdf] [tex] [original] What’s wrong with Bayesian methods? (1984) [pdf] [tex] [original]

item.title: Quantum Field Theory
